articles.title: Microsoft's Activision takeover approved by EU after UK veto - BBC
articles.description: The proposed $69bn acquisition of Activision is splitting global regulators over competition concerns
articles.content:
EU regulators have approved Microsoft's $69bn (£55bn) attempt to purchase Call of Duty publisher Activision Blizzard.
The European Commission (EC) said Microsoft had addressed their concerns on comp… [+6004 chars]
